manifest.name: Highlight Public Notes
manifest.description: This plugin warns that a note is public (based on a frontmatter attribute) by colorizing the note red.
manifest.author: dennis seidel

data.manifestValue: This plugin warns that a note is public (based on a frontmatter attribute) by colorizing the note red.
data.communityListValue: Warn that a note is public (based on a frontmatter attribute) by coloring the note red.
